name: VR Cyclops
description:
VR Cyclops 

Problem turned into a funny game idea:

I had limited resource for VR, only cheap Google Cardboard with limitation of only one trigger and no controllers. So, here is a virus killer cyclops game who shoots laser.

In game, keep laser cooled down state, overuse of laser may disable it temporarily for few seconds. 

Hope you enjoyed and please also leave comments.
